skills.name: DISABLE
desc: • Deals random damage to a single target.
• Deal 2 hits of Additional True Damage and Remove All Shields if the target has a shield active.
• This damage does not wake enemies inflicted with Sleep or Perfect Sleep.

skills.name: GAS GRENADE
desc: • Remove Negative Effects, including Silver Effects, from self and a target ally.
• Inflict Sleep on each enemy for 1 turn.
• Gain a Perfect Heal Shield and Perfect Immunity for 2 turns.

skills.name: GAS MASK
desc: Grant Immunity to Sleep, Perfect Sleep, and Magic Burn to all allies. Grant Vanish to all allies for 2 turns if Vanish is present at the start of your turn.
